name: FIRE BREATHING SPACE CORGI
description:
You are Tequila, a FIRE BREATHING SPACE CORGI! You have just received a distress call from your home planet, which has been hit by a meteorite! Travel back through different planets as fast as you can, and find what remains of your home.

Controls:

W and D to Move.  

SPACE or W to Jump. 

LEFT MOUSE to Attack. 

SHIFT to Dash.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2022.

Themes:

Kill it with fire - Space Corgi Flames

Blocks - Pixel Art Technically :)

Soundtrack by Louis Cook. Listen on Soundcloud.
